plurals.name: fui_error_weak_password
plurals.item: Password not strong enough. Use at least %1$d character and a mix of letters and numbers
Password not strong enough. Use at least %1$d characters and a mix of letters and numbers

string.translation_description: Inline error for signup failure

string.translation_description: Link text to web url containing the app's terms of service

string.name: fui_welcome_back_idp_header
string.translation_description: Inline subtitle to users whose signup was interrupted since an existing account was detected

string.name: fui_welcome_back_email_header
string.translation_description: Message for returning users

string.name: fui_welcome_back_email_link_header
string.translation_description: Message for returning users

string.name: fui_welcome_back_idp_prompt
string.translation_description: Message to users that need to signin using existing IDP accounts

resources.string: You\'ve already used %1$s. Sign in with %2$s to continue.

string.name: fui_welcome_back_password_prompt_body
string.translation_description: Message to users that need to signin using existing email accounts

resources.string: You\'ve already used %1$s to sign in. Enter your password for that account.

string.name: fui_welcome_back_email_link_prompt_body
string.translation_description: Message to users that need to signin using existing email link accounts

resources.string: You\'ve already used %1$s. You can connect your %2$s account with %1$s by signing in with email link below.\n\nFor this flow to successfully connect your %2$s account with this email, you have to open the link on the same device or browser.

string.translation_description: Progress dialog text

string.translation_description: Link leading to forgot password flow

string.translation_description: Recover password screen title

string.translation_description: Password recovery confirmation message

string.translation_description: Password recovery message body

resources.string: Get instructions sent to this email that explain how to reset your password.

string.name: fui_button_text_send
string.translation_description: Button text to send recovery email

string.name: fui_confirm_recovery_body
string.translation_description: Alert dialog displayed after password recovery email is sent

resources.string: Follow the instructions sent to %1$s to recover your password.

string.translation_description: Progress dialog while password recovery email or email link is being sent

resources.string: That email address doesn\'t match an existing account

string.translation_description: General error messages for an unknown failure.

string.translation_description: Error message for when the user enters an invalid or wrong password.

string.name: fui_passwords_do_not_match
string.translation_description: Error message when password don't match

string.name: fui_error_password_too_short
string.translation_description: Error message when password is too short

resources.string: Password must be at least %1$d characters long

string.name: fui_error_password_missing_uppercase
string.translation_description: Error message when password is missing uppercase letter

resources.string: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter

string.name: fui_error_password_missing_lowercase
string.translation_description: Error message when password is missing lowercase letter

resources.string: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter

string.name: fui_error_password_missing_digit
string.translation_description: Error message when password is missing digit

resources.string: Password must contain at least one number

string.name: fui_error_password_missing_special_character
string.translation_description: Error message when password is missing special character

resources.string: Password must contain at least one special character

string.name: fui_accessibility_logo
string.translation_description: Content description for app logo

string.name: fui_email_link_header
string.translation_description: Email link sign in email sent header

string.name: fui_email_link_email_sent
string.translation_description: Text to tell the user that the email has been sent

resources.string: A sign-in email with additional instructions was sent to %1$s. Check your email to complete sign-in.

string.name: fui_email_link_trouble_getting_email_header
string.translation_description: Header that is displayed on the trouble signing in activity

string.name: fui_email_link_trouble_getting_possible_fixes
string.translation_description: A list of possible fixes for receiving the email

resources.string:
Try these common fixes:
• Check if the email was marked as spam or filtered.
• Check your internet connection.
• Check that you did not misspell your email.
• Check that your inbox space is not running out or other inbox setting related issues.

string.name: fui_email_link_resend
string.translation_description: Button text to resend

string.name: fui_email_link_wrong_device_header
string.translation_description: Header shown when the user opens a link that was sent from a different device

string.name: fui_email_link_wrong_device_message
string.translation_description: Message shown when the user opens a link that was sent from a different device

resources.string: Try opening the link using the same device or browser where you started the sign-in process.

string.name: fui_email_link_invalid_link_header
string.translation_description: Header shown when the user opens a link that was sent from a different device

string.name: fui_email_link_invalid_link_message
string.translation_description: Message shown when the user opens a link that was sent from a different device

resources.string: The action code is invalid. This can happen if the code is malformed, expired, or has already been used.

string.name: fui_email_link_different_anonymous_user_header
string.translation_description: Header shown when the user opens a link but the underlying session has changed

string.name: fui_email_link_different_anonymous_user_message
string.translation_description: Message shown when the user opens a link but the underlying session has changed

resources.string: The session associated with this sign-in request has either expired or was cleared.

string.name: fui_email_link_confirm_email_header
string.translation_description: Header shown when prompting the user to confirm their email to complete the sign in

string.name: fui_email_link_confirm_email_message
string.translation_description: Message shown when prompting the user to confirm their email to finish the sign in flow

resources.string: Confirm email to continue sign in

string.name: fui_email_link_dismiss_button
string.translation_description: Dismiss button for the wrong device or invalid link dialog

string.name: fui_email_link_cross_device_linking_text
string.translation_description: Text shown when the user opens an email link on a different device, but they had originally intended to link a provider to their account.

resources.string: You originally intended to connect %1$s to your email account but have opened the link on a different device where you are not signed in.\n\nIf you still want to connect your %1$s account, open the link on the same device where you started sign-in. Otherwise, tap Continue to sign-in on this device.

string.translation_description: Phone number entry form title

string.translation_description: Inline error when phone number entered is invalid

resources.string: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to

string.name: fui_verifying

string.translation_description: Inline error when incorrect sms verification code is being used to verify

string.name: fui_error_too_many_attempts
string.translation_description: Error message when the phone number has been used too many times

resources.string: This phone number has been used too many times

string.name: fui_error_quota_exceeded
string.translation_description: Error message when the Firebase project's quota has been exceeded.

resources.string: There was a problem verifying your phone number

string.name: fui_error_session_expired
string.translation_description: Error message when SMS confirmation code has expired.

resources.string: This code is no longer valid

string.name: fui_sign_in_with_phone_number
string.translation_description: Label for phone number input form

string.name: fui_auto_verified
string.translation_description: Popup informing the user that their phone number was automatically verified

string.name: fui_resend_code
string.translation_description: Link text to resend verification sms

string.translation_description: Button text to submit confirmation code and complete phone verification

string.name: fui_change_phone_number
string.translation_description: Link text to change the phone number during verification

string.name: fui_sms_terms_of_service
string.translation_description: Fine print warning displayed below Verify Phone Number button

resources.string: By tapping "%1$s", an SMS may be sent. Message & data rates may apply.

string.name: fui_sms_terms_of_service_and_privacy_policy_extended
string.translation_description: Fine print warning displayed below Verify Phone Number button

resources.string: By tapping "%1$s", you are indicating that you accept our %2$s and %3$s. An SMS may be sent. Message & data rates may apply.

string.name: fui_error_dialog_title
string.translation_description: Title for error recovery dialog

string.name: fui_error_retry_action
string.translation_description: Retry button text in error dialog

string.name: fui_error_mfa_required_message
string.translation_description: Error message when MFA is required

resources.string: Additional verification required. Please complete multi-factor authentication.

string.name: fui_error_account_linking_required_message
string.translation_description: Error message when account linking is required

resources.string: Account needs to be linked. Please try a different sign-in method.

string.name: fui_error_auth_cancelled_message
string.translation_description: Error message when authentication is cancelled

resources.string: Authentication was cancelled. Please try again when ready.

string.name: fui_mfa_step_select_factor_title
string.translation_description: Title for MFA factor selection step

string.name: fui_mfa_step_configure_sms_title
string.translation_description: Title for SMS MFA configuration step

string.name: fui_mfa_step_configure_totp_title
string.translation_description: Title for TOTP MFA configuration step

string.name: fui_mfa_step_verify_factor_title
string.translation_description: Title for MFA verification step

string.name: fui_mfa_step_show_recovery_codes_title
string.translation_description: Title for recovery codes step

string.name: fui_mfa_step_select_factor_helper
string.translation_description: Helper text for selecting MFA factor

resources.string: Select a second authentication method to secure your account

string.name: fui_mfa_step_configure_sms_helper
string.translation_description: Helper text for SMS configuration

resources.string: Enter your phone number to receive verification codes

string.name: fui_mfa_step_configure_totp_helper
string.translation_description: Helper text for TOTP configuration

resources.string: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app

string.name: fui_mfa_step_verify_factor_sms_helper
string.translation_description: Helper text for SMS verification

resources.string: Enter the code sent to your phone

string.name: fui_mfa_step_verify_factor_totp_helper
string.translation_description: Helper text for TOTP verification

resources.string: Enter the code from your authenticator app

string.name: fui_mfa_step_verify_factor_generic_helper
string.translation_description: Generic helper text for factor verification

string.name: fui_mfa_step_show_recovery_codes_helper
string.translation_description: Helper text for recovery codes

resources.string: Store these codes in a safe place. You can use them to sign in if you lose access to your authentication method.

string.name: fui_mfa_enrollment_enter_phone_number
string.translation_description: Title for MFA phone number enrollment screen (top app bar)

string.name: fui_mfa_enrollment_verify_sms_code
string.translation_description: Title for MFA SMS verification screen (top app bar)

string.name: fui_mfa_error_recent_login_required
string.translation_description: Error message when MFA enrollment requires recent authentication

resources.string: This operation requires recent authentication. Please sign in again and try again.

string.name: fui_mfa_error_invalid_verification_code
string.translation_description: Error message when MFA enrollment fails due to invalid verification code

resources.string: The verification code is incorrect. Please try again.

string.name: fui_mfa_error_network
string.translation_description: Error message when MFA enrollment fails due to network issues

resources.string: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.

string.name: fui_mfa_error_generic
string.translation_description: Generic error message for MFA enrollment failures

resources.string: An error occurred during enrollment. Please try again.
